item.title: Became a Published Author with "Whispering Solitude"
item.description: Did you know that every story has its own taste & color? Some stories are between black & white, some are bright gold and, some are just old yellow. The ‘Whispering Solitude’ is created to celebrate the blue stories of the imaginations running wild. One of those wild, yet colorful imaginations, is penned down by me!

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: As the title says, this post is here just to greet you, the visitor. You can click here, keep on reading, but all of that just to find out that there was nothing “interesting” in here. But I’ve kept a continue reading link, to continue reading this post, if you want to continue reading this post. üòÅ

item.title: >_ whoami
item.description: Dhruv Joshi. I am one of those computer programmers who makes things work (be it a software, web app or even frameworks!), with the help of following: Programming Languages: Python C++ JavaScript HTML5 CSS3 JAVA C# Web Development: Git Linux VS Code NodeJS Sass Bootstrap Chrome Firefox MongoDB MySQL 3D Animation: Yes.
